labels.LABEL_13: Note: Please save the Vitals form to record the observations .

concepts.SYSTOLIC_BLOOD_PRESSURE_5_DESC: A patient's systolic blood pressure measurement (taken with a manual cuff in either a sitting or standing position)
concepts.DIASTOLIC_BLOOD_PRESSURE_7_DESC: A patient's diastolic blood pressure measurement (taken with a manual cuff in either a sitting or standing position)
concepts.PULSE_1_DESC: Patient pulse rate, as measured with a peripheral oximeter.
